mapper.insert: insert into reply(r_no,cm_bdno,um_no,r_content,r_del) values((select nvl(max(r_no),0)+1) from reply), #{cm_bdno}, #{um_no}, #{r_content}, #{r_del}
mapper.select:
select * from reply where 1 = 1
and um_no like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and r_content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
order by r_no desc
mapper.update: update reply set r_content = #{r_content} where r_no = #{r_no}
